name: March 2021 project
description:
A small indoor and outdoor level, made in Unity 3D. I worked on this project over our Prototyping Games course.

How to launch: download the ZIP file on this page and extract it. Look for the PrototypingGamesProject.exe file in the extracted folder, and run that.

Controls:

  • WASD for player movement
  • Left shift to sprint
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Left mouseclick to attack
  • R to restore health
  • Escape to pause game

Third-party assets:

  • Basic Motions, Melee Warrior and Dance Animations packs by Kevin Iglesias
  • Sherbb's Particle Collection by Sherbb
  • Voxel Scifi Environment by trilobite_mx
  • Terrain Tools by Unity Technologies
  • WorldSkies Skybox pack by Pulsar Bytes
  • Simple Water Shaders by Nicholas Veselov
  • Birch Tree pack by Works For Fun
  • Ancient Jungle Temple by 3PupperStudios
  • Columns by StarGames studio
